Question: Navlungo Lojistik Ve Teknoloji Anonim Sirketi CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Navlungo Lojistik Ve Teknoloji Anonim Sirketi

Cargo & Freight Shipping Platform

- Get instant transportation quotes to more than 130 countries
- Manage your logistics operations effectively
- Automate the whole cargo process
- Manage all your cross-border e-commerce logistics operations through our smart dashboard
- Save time in your global cargo operations

Online Logistics Assistant

- Getting a cargo offer with Navlungo is as easy as getting online flight tickets
- Connect your store on global marketplaces to our panel
- Enter the dimension and weight of your order into our smart dashboard, compare the quotes, and select the most suitable option for your cargo need
- Grow your e-commerce business with our smart and customized dashboard

Seaway and Freight Logistics

- Get stronger with the global network of agencies when managing your logistics operations
- Ship your Amazon FBA orders with our Amazon Seaway Service
- Fulfillment Service
- Enjoy e-commerce logistics and fulfillment services we present in 8 different countries
- Leave warehousing, order processing, invoicing, packaging, shipping, return, and customer management to us

Partner Cargo Companies

- Take advantage of the privileged service and special offers that our global partner cargo companies present to Navlungo customers
- Any company wishing to expand its business overseas can utilize the freight logistics and international warehousing & fulfillment services of Navlungo
Summary_cn:
导航物流与技术股份有限公司

货物和货运平台

- 获得超过130个国家的即时运输报价
- 有效管理您的物流运营
- 自动化整个货物流程
- 通过我们智能仪表板管理您的跨境电子商务物流运营
- 在全球货物运营中节省时间

在线物流助手

- 通过Navlungo获得货物报价就像购买在线机票一样简单
- 将您的店铺连接到全球市场上我们的面板
- 在我们的智能仪表板中输入订单的尺寸和重量，比较报价，并选择最适合您货物需求的选项
- 借助我们智能和定制的仪表板来发展您的电子商务业务

海运和货运物流

- 在管理您的物流运营时，借助全球代理网络增强实力
- 使用我们的亚马逊海运服务发运您的亚马逊FBA订单
- 履行服务
- 在8个不同国家为您提供电子商务物流和履行服务
- 将仓储、订单处理、发票、包装、发货、退回和客户管理交给我们

合作伙伴货运公司

- 利用我们的全球合作伙伴货运公司为Navlungo客户提供的特权服务和特别优惠
- 任何希望将业务扩展到海外的公司都可以利用Navlungo的货物物流和国际仓储履行服务。
